metadata.title: CVE-2020-27762 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in coders/hdr.c. An attacker who submits acrafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could trigger undefinedbehavior in the form of values outside the range of type `unsigned char`.This would most likely lead to an impact to application availability, butcould potentially cause other problems related to undefined behavior. Thisflaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to ImageMagick 7.0.8-68.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
